## How this project should be applied

This project is structural divided into three main folders:

1) code
2) data
3) out


### Code

The folder 'code' is divided thematically into 

+ 0_preprocessing
+ 01_univariate_maps
+ 02_lc_analyis
+ 03_spatial_regression

and should be run in that order
